attributes.action: Increase funding for SEN in schools and agencies supporting
attributes.additional_details: Your being turned away, or declined even though there is a law to protect children. This is being ignored. So many children are struggling in school, and this may result in, no attendance due to anxiety and unable to manage. This is effecting their education. Schools are unable to manage, they don't have the right training or experience to deal with these situations. The only option is to go privately to seek help for educational support is not affordable in the current climate.
attributes.background: Increase funding significantly to support schools parents and agencies with children who have SEN

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616727 
'Increase funding for schools to support children with disabilities and SEN'.
